column4: Hi.  When I use "apt-cache search", I have to do some sort of index command before hand, right?  What was that command?  "apt-cache update" or something?
Really?  I had the impression that apt-cache and apt-get used different indices, for some reason.  Has that changed?  If I use apt-get to update, then apt-cache will also update?
oh? not sure, you may be right, I'ven't use apt-cache that much
